name: CVE-2022-22480
description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.4 and 7.5 data node rebalancing does not function correctly when using encrypted hosts which could result in information disclosure. IBM X-Force ID: 225889.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:qradar_security_information_and_event_manager:7.4.3:fix_pack_1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:qradar_security_information_and_event_manager:7.4.3:fix_pack_2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:qradar_security_information_and_event_manager:7.4.3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:qradar_security_information_and_event_manager:7.4.3:fix_pack_3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:qradar_security_information_and_event_manager:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:qradar_security_information_and_event_manager:7.5.0:-:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:qradar_security_information_and_event_manager:7.4.3:fix_pack_4:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:qradar_security_information_and_event_manager:7.5.0:update_pack_1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:qradar_security_information_and_event_manager:7.5.0:update_pack_2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:qradar_security_information_and_event_manager:7.4.3:fix_pack_5:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:qradar_security_information_and_event_manager:7.4.3:fix_pack_6:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:linux:linux_kernel:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
